item.title: BLÆRG live at Super Collider in Philadelphia, PA
item.dc:creator: Daniel Tuttle
item.description:
As part of his mini east coast tour, BLÆRG is also stopping by Philadelphia, PA to perform at SUPER COLLIDER at The Black Box at Underground Arts. Also featuring Duran Duran Duran, Speak Onion and others. 1200 Callowhill Street Philadelphia,…

The post BLÆRG live at Super Collider in Philadelphia, PA appeared first on Bottle Imp Productions.
item.content:encoded:
As part of his mini east coast tour, BLÆRG is also stopping by Philadelphia, PA to perform at SUPER COLLIDER at The Black Box at Underground Arts. Also featuring Duran Duran Duran, Speak Onion and others.

1200 Callowhill Street
Philadelphia, Pennsylvania 19108

View on Songkick.

The post BLÆRG live at Super Collider in Philadelphia, PA appeared first on Bottle Imp Productions.

item.title: Row Boat & Apta collaboration: “Fracture”
item.dc:creator: Daniel Tuttle
item.description:
New collaboration EP between Apta and Row Boat will be available next week on October 8th. Will be available on all major digital stores as well as a limited edition CD. Happy to announce a new collaboration between myself &…

The post Row Boat & Apta collaboration: “Fracture” appeared first on Bottle Imp Productions.
item.content:encoded:
New collaboration EP between Apta and Row Boat will be available next week on October 8th. Will be available on all major digital stores as well as a limited edition CD.

Happy to announce a new collaboration between myself & @AptaMusic titled 'Fracture' through @bottleimpmusic. OCT 8th! pic.twitter.com/yLFzNMvH7O

— Row Boat (@rowboatmusic) October 2, 2013

The post Row Boat & Apta collaboration: “Fracture” appeared first on Bottle Imp Productions.
